title.narrative: Comprehensive One Stop Centers for multi sectoral GBV services for survivors of Gender Based Violence- Inside Erbil city and Soran district

description.narrative: Three hospitals, located in the cities of Erbil and Soran (Diana) 2 in Erbil and 1 in Soran,are in need of Clinical Management of Rape and other GBV response intervention, because of the high prevalence of GBV. The Maternity hospital and West Erbil Emergency Hospital in Erbil has a catchment area of the whole city and district of Erbil, which are 152,899 households. Ashti General Hospital in Soran has a catchment area of the whole city and district of Soran and serves 27,707 households.

To address the crucial needs of GBV survivors, Cordaid aims to establish Three OSCs that offer protection and deliver confidential and comprehensive services. This will 1) fill the needs gap of SGBV survivors in Erbil and Soran; 2) address the needs identified by the MoH and the Hospitals; and 3) allow Cordaid to build on the experience of its program on MHPSS and GBV the past years. Cordaid’s experience will build the capacity within the local medical, social work and police infrastructure, ensuring sustainability of impact.

mailing-address.narrative: Grote Marktstraat 45, Den Haag, Zuid Holland, 2511 BH
